text: Ok we are rolling this out to everyone in a few minutes. Let me know if you are seeing any issues.

If you are using the default module, everything will just work. If you have cloned the module, switch to using something like `<form action="/{{ site_settings.content_search_results_page_path }}">` so you don't keep going to the `hs-search-results` page.
Did the query params move in the new module?

There are some changes to the async queries and where to edit params. The search results module now gets it’s params from the URL or the search results page. For the input module, you can add params for the typeahead by adding hidden `<input>` tags for each param
Is there a way to get this to work with wildcards? like if I want the value to be “contact*” so it would search both /contact-us and /contact-bob
Because it's a prefix match, you can just have `pathPrefix=contact` and it will match everything `contact*`
To only match things under `contact/*`, you would set `pathPrefix=contact/`
